name: ASTRO v.0.1
description:
ASTRO is a 2D - Sidescroller Shoot 'Em Up set in space. In this version of the game there is only 1 level and 1 boss fight. I plan to extend upon this, adding more levels and boss fights. Here are the controls:

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Shoot

Mouse: Aim

Shift: Shield

Spacebar: Bomb

Thanks for playing, any feedback/recommendations are greatly appreciated!
